New York

40 Fulton St, New York, NY 10038, USA ( Show on map)

Mon–Fri, 9:00–18:00

Overview Map Amenities Request a tour Events
0.0478 ETH ≈US$8.41
The city that never sleeps welcomes Primalbase NYC, the company that never sleeps. This incredible new space sits in the heart of Manhattan, overlooking the majestic Brooklyn bridge and the thriving financial district of Wall Street just seconds away. You’ll find everything you’d expect from a Primalbase office and more, from the fantastic views to the full range of amenities you need to drive your project forward. So whether you’re a solo developer or a full-fledged startup, you’ll find a perfect fit at Primalbase New York.
795 m² Office Space
48 Hot Desks
7 Private Offices
1 Meeting Room

R&R Coffee

Hip and modern coffee shop in the heart of FiDi serving expertly made coffee and espresso as well as a selection of baked goods and fresh sandwiches made in house. Currently serving up locally-roasted beans from Toby's Estate.

Open in Google Maps

Get more info

Cobble & Co

Cobble & Co. was created to cook up a fresh take on American classics like burgers, nachos and wings in the heart of the Seaport District. Everything served is made from scratch in house. Come by and taste the difference.

Open in Google Maps

Get more info

South Seaport Museum

The South Street Seaport Museum is a cultural institution dedicated to telling the story of the rise of New York as a port city and its critical role in the development of the United States. The Museum uses its historic buildings and ships to provide interactive exhibits, education, and experiences.

Open in Google Maps

Get more info

Acqua at Peck Slip

Located in the historic district of South Street Seaport, on the corner of Peck Slip and Water Street, ACQUA is an Italian restaurant serving up Italian coastal cuisine. Open every day: Monday through Friday from 5pm to 10:30pm for Dinner. Saturday and Sunday from 11am to 4pm for Brunch and from 4pm to 11pm for Dinner

Open in Google Maps

Get more info

Joe's Pizza

Joe's is the joint you actually want to go out of your way for. For $2, you get a thin slice of hot pizza, topped with tangy-sweet tomato sauce and patches of fresh mozzarella. None of the plastic-y, reheated stuff here: pies are made to order. With these lines they go fast, so the supply is constantly replenished

Open in Google Maps

Get more info

East River Ferry Stop

From Brooklyn, Queens, and Long Island City there is the East River ferry stop at Pier 11, a 10-minute walk from the office.

Get assistance — it’s what our operations managers are there for.

Private phone booths

Keep your business phone calls between you and your clients, investors or partners.

Kitchen

Take a break in our modern kitchen.

Free drinks and snacks

Enjoy free coffee, tea, soft drinks, fresh fruit and various snacks.

Meeting room

Book our spacious meeting room to hold same-day project meetings for up to two hours. (Pre-booking required.)

Event

Use our open auditorium or lecture room to host events for Primalbase community members, partners and friends. (Pre-booking required.)

Greeting Area

If you can’t meet your guests or clients immediately, at least you’ll know they’re comfortable.

Request a free tour

Our operational managers are always happy to show you round the spaces and answer all your questions

Please take note that for our office in New York, there will be strictly no entry if a reservation/booking request has not been made before hand.

Upcoming events

There are currently no upcoming events. Subscribe to our newsletter and follow us on social media so you can be alerted as soon as more are added.

How to pay with Ethereum

1. Get some Ethereum

Primalbase accepts payments only in Ethereum (ETH), so you need to get some first. If you already have it, feel free to skip to step 2. You can buy Ethereum for your preferred fiat currency (USD, EUR, GBP etc.) on any digital currency exchange such as Coinbase, Changelly, Kraken, Poloniex and many others. The process is usually straightforward, but it might take a few days to verify your identity there.

2. Transfer Ethereum to your private wallet

Now you need to transfer your ETH from digital currency exchange (see step 1) to your private wallet such as MetaMask, MyEtherWallet or Ledger. Avoid paying for your Primalbase bookings directly from exchanges as we won't be able to refund your payment in refund cases.

3. Pay for your Primalbase booking

To pay for your booking, you’ll need to transfer Ethereum from your private wallet (see step 2) to our unique ETH wallet which is shown on Payment details page.

What are Primalbase Tokens?

Primalbase Tokens (PBT) are our own digital asset. It gives you a permanent membership to our workspaces. Community members who own Primalbase Tokens can book a desk (1 PBT) or an entire office (4 PBT) at any Primalbase location worldwide for free.

Link wallet

We have a special offer

Primalbase has a separate program for companies that need an office for an extended period of time. If you're interested, click below to find out more about the program and apply to become a resident.
